description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base with a specific PDF file, sets up a vector database, creates an agent with the knowledge base, and queries the agent for a recipe.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

classes.name: PDFBytesKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads PDF content as bytes and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation used to store and retrieve PDF embeddings.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the PDF knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
